South Sudan NGO Forum
Facilitating coordination of NGO's to effectively operate in South Sudan

About

This section gives a brief summary of the NGO's in South Sudan. In addition it will link to supplementary documents and if nescessary, it will have a button below, linking to a page containing a more complete profile of NGO's operating in the country.

This section is a brief summary of the Forum and Secrretariat. It should summarize its history, main functions and have a button below linking to page containing the Statutes of Operation etc.

read more

Membership

This section lists and summarizes the criteria for membership of the NGO Forum. The prerequsite of registration with the Ministry of Labour and Relief and Reconstruction Commission is also mentioned

This section details the different stages involved in registration with the Forum. It lists the steps; Application form submission; approval by the Steering Committee; and prestation/voting at the monthly Country Directors meeting.

read more
